name: STOP!!! COVID-19
description:
It is a game to defend the Corona virus.

You can left and right rudder key. And if you press the keyboard, you can move the MASK left and right. You must defend the Corona virus by moving the mask. Don't avoid the virus.

And you can get alcohol and vaccine. These things will help you.

If you don't defend the virus or get a vaccine, the background of the game will changes. Defend the virus, get a vaccine, save the world from virus.

The news(GOOD NEWS, BAD NEWS, LIFE NEWS) is written in only Korean. The news related the Corona virus in Korea. And it changes defending on the progress of the game.

Please save the world from Corona virus. Don't avoid the virus, MUST defend the virus.

Thank you for playing game. Good luck.
